data.text:
Siwan, Bihar, India

Latitude and longitude coordinates are: 26.219622, 84.356659.

Siwan is a city and the capital of the same name district in the state of Bihar, central India. The name of the city is derived from the word 'border' on the local dialect. Siwan is a principal center of transportation, with a very vivid bus and railway transportation, both commercial and passenger. The number of residents of the city is exceeding 180,000.
